addMeasurementsDescription: Add tailoring measurements. It’s absolutely free!
titleOrderSuccess: Plum has received your order. So what’s next?
textOrderSuccess: Check {{email}} for the order confirmation letter. Once the order is ready, we will send you a tracking number. If you want to be in the know about all our new drops, why not give us a follow on Instagram?
textFailedOrder: Something went wrong. Please try again or contact us at help@pluplum.co

name: Recipient's full name
commentDescription: Enter your measurements and instructions for the courier here, or just leave this input blank

emptyCartDescription: Come back when you’ll find what you love and will add it to the cart
agree: By clicking checkout, you are agreeing with Privacy Policy & Terms
